context.phaseGoal: Create Locust load testing scripts for critical API paths

userStories.description: Set up Locust load testing framework with base user class, authentication helpers, and configuration. Location: upstream/tests_performance_base.py

userStories.title: Write signup flow load tests
userStories.description: Create Locust tests for signup flow: account creation, tier selection, checkout redirect. Target: 50 concurrent signups, <500ms response. Location: upstream/tests_performance_signup.py

userStories.title: Write API endpoint load tests

userStories.title: Create load test CI configuration
userStories.description: Add GitHub Actions workflow for running load tests on staging. Location: .github/workflows/load-tests.yml
